info.title: Product Allocation Object
info.description: You can use this service to read the data from product allocation objects as well as read, edit and delete characteristic value combinations and their corresponding time series (planned allocation quantities per period).

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read, edit and delete product allocation object data

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Produce ATP: Product Allocation Object (I_PRODALLOCATIONOBJECTTP)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.description: Reads data of all product allocation objects. You can retrieve the product allocation object UUID, product allocation object ID, description, period type, factory calendar, quantity unit, check date time type, collective allocation type, creation date, last changed date and created by and last changed by data.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Product Allocation Object UUID

get.description: Reads data of a specific product allocation object. You can retrieve the product allocation object UUID, product allocation object ID, description, period type, factory calendar, quantity unit, check date time type, collective allocation type, creation date, last changed date and created by and last changed by data.

get.summary: Reads product allocation object time series.
get.description: Reads all product allocation object time series of a specific characteristic value combination. You can retrieve  UTC period start date, period start time zone, UTC period end date, period end time zone, quantity and quantity unit.

post.summary: Creates product allocation object time series.
post.description: Creates a product allocation time series for a characteristic value combination using a UTC period start date, period start time zone, UTC period end date, period end time zone, quantity and quantity unit.

post.description: Deletes a specific characteristic value combination of a product allocation object including all dependent data (time series, quantity assignments).

parameters.name: CharcValueCombinationUUID
parameters.description:
Characteristic Value Combination UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

parameters.name: Isdeleteqa
parameters.description: TRUE

post.summary: Sets lifecycle status of a characteristic value combination to Active.
post.description: Sets the lifecycle status of a characteristic value combination to Active for a given product allocation object.

parameters.name: CharcValueCombinationUUID
parameters.description:
Characteristic Value Combination UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.summary: Sets lifecycle status of a characteristic value combination to Inactive.
post.description: Sets the lifecycle status of a characteristic value combination to Inactive for a given product allocation object.

parameters.name: CharcValueCombinationUUID
parameters.description:
Characteristic Value Combination UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.summary: Deletes time series of a characteristic value combination.
post.description: Deletes a specific time series and dependent quantity assignments of a characteristic value combination of a product allocation object.

parameters.name: ProdAllocationTimeSeriesUUID
parameters.description:
Product Allocation Time SeriesUUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

parameters.name: Isdeleteqa
parameters.description: TRUE

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ProdAllocationObject HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
